text: 6:16 Matyu 6:24; Jon 8:34; 2 Pita 2:19Ia ti kamaghɨn fos o? Ia uari isɨ, gumazitam danɨngɨva, an akamɨn gɨn mangɨva, an ingangarir gumazamizibar otivigham. Kamaghɨra, ia arazir kuramɨn ingangarir gumazamizibar ikɨtɨ, a ia damightɨ ia aremegham. Egh ia Godɨn akam bareghɨva an gɨn mangɨva an ingangarir gumazamizibar ikɨtɨ, a ia damightɨ, ia an damazimɨn deragham.
